section.title: Hear Your AI Agent
section.description: Listen to actual conversations between prospects and your AI agent across different real estate scenarios.

demos.title: Property Inquiry Call
demos.scenario: Interested buyer calling about Dubai Marina villa
demos.description: A potential buyer calls asking about a 2-bedroom villa listing. Watch how the AI provides detailed information, answers questions about amenities, and books a viewing appointment.

demos.title: Lead Qualification
demos.description: A first-time buyer calls with budget constraints. The AI qualifies their needs, discusses financing options, and connects them with suitable properties within their range.

demos.title: Rescheduling & Coordination
demos.scenario: Client needs to reschedule viewing appointment
demos.description: An existing client needs to reschedule their property viewing due to a work conflict. The AI checks availability, reschedules seamlessly, and sends confirmations.

demos.title: Investment Inquiry
demos.scenario: Investor asking about ROI and market trends
demos.description: An experienced investor calls about potential investment properties in Business Bay. The AI provides market analysis, ROI calculations, and investment insights.

demos.title: Arabic Language Support
demos.description: A client preferring to speak in Arabic calls about family housing options in Dubai. The AI responds fluently in Arabic, understanding cultural preferences and requirements.

demos.title: Emergency After-Hours
demos.scenario: Urgent property issue outside business hours
demos.description: A tenant calls at 11 PM about a property maintenance emergency. The AI handles the urgent request, connects with emergency services, and notifies the property manager.
